# Metrics Output Directory
#
# PURPOSE: Stores evaluation metric logs and comparison tables
# generated by `src/utils/metrics.py` during model evaluation.
#
# TYPICAL CONTENTS:
#   - villain_metrics.json   → nDCG@12, MRR, Coverage for baseline
#   - hero_metrics.json      → nDCG@12, MRR, Coverage for main model
#   - comparison_table.csv   → Side-by-side metric comparison
#
# Team: Ishan, Elizabeth, Nishant
